verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a tweet] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: blamed] [ARG1: Democrats] [ARG2: for his administration ’s new immigration policy of separating parents and their children at the U.S .- Mexico border] .
In a tweet , President Trump blamed Democrats for his administration ’s new immigration policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: parents and their children] [ARGM-LOC: at the U.S .- Mexico border] .
